items.sentence: I don't feel well after drinking that water.
I had hoped to have finished this yesterday.
I found the banana on a steep mountain road.
I felt as happy as if I were still dreaming.
I have no more than one hundred yen with me.
I looked in as many dictionaries as I could.
I stayed up much later when I was a student.
I talked my wife out of buying a new carpet.
I got in trouble with the police last night.
I haven't read all the books on the shelves.
I ran as fast as I could to catch the train.
I got up so an old man could sit in my seat.
I was wondering if you could give me a lift.
I was scolded by the teacher for being late.
I spent my time strolling about the streets.
I had no desire to say anything against you.
I concocted an excuse for missing the party.
I know that they're in love with each other.
I conceived of the plan while I was smoking.
I introduced two of my friends at the party.
